3: Nat... Nanami can see Nat and her servants...
Nat, Queen of Gold. She claims to be the creator of the Golden Vortex.
Creator my butt. If this piece of shit is behind those experiments, then she is worse than the Corrupted.
Nanami saw it, the laboratory you found, Karenina...
You, me, every invader... Nat sees us all. When Nanami hacked into her network, I synced with her 'vision.'
How about Roland? Did you see him?
Nat could see everyone but Roland... But Nanami also found the Gray Ravens and Commandant taken by Nat! Nanami wants to save Commandant!
If their commandant has been taken, we'll have to rethink our whole operation... But our comms is not working, and Babylonia doesn't know yet...
Forget Roland! Saving Gray Raven is our priority! Rescuing Commandant is more important than everything else!
We have a blueprint now! Nanami, can you find out where Nat is?
